name.description: The name of the damage source. Controls death message as well as other interactions. Consider the [List of Damage Source Names](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/data_types/damage_source) when picking a name.
name.markdownDescription: The name of the damage source. Controls death message as well as other interactions. Consider the [List of Damage Source Names](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/data_types/damage_source) when picking a name.

bypasses_armor.description: When true, armor values are not taken into account when calculating the actual damage amount taken.
bypasses_armor.markdownDescription: When true, armor values are not taken into account when calculating the actual damage amount taken.

fire.description: When true, the damage will be considered fire damage.
fire.markdownDescription: When true, the damage will be considered fire damage.

unblockable.description: When true, the damage will be unblockable (not reduced by resistance effects or protection enchantments).
unblockable.markdownDescription: When true, the damage will be unblockable (not reduced by resistance effects or protection enchantments).

magic.description: When true, the damage will be considered magic damage.
magic.markdownDescription: When true, the damage will be considered magic damage.

out_of_world.description: When true, the damage will be considered "out of world" damage, i.e. damage from falling into the void.
out_of_world.markdownDescription: When true, the damage will be considered "out of world" damage, i.e. damage from falling into the void.
